entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Clearing this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 14 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Friday 31 March 2023
